name: Thoughtscape
description:
Thoughtscape is a game about mental illness inspired by Tetris and Kaboom!.

 You play as Sam, a young guy, that tends to get lost on his thoughts when he gets a shower. Who doesn't? Catch/avoid his thoughts to balance his sanity in an arcade score based endless game through days or even weeks.

Controls: Slide Sam horizontally

Objective: Get many points as possible and beat your high score

Gustavo Maldonado - Game Designer, Programmer, Sound Designer

Bernado Santos - 2D Artist, Animator
